# Interface RemoteKnowledgeConfigInterface

Configuration for remote knowledge system

interface RemoteKnowledgeConfigInterface {  
apiKey: string;  
knowledgeCompileConfig: [KnowledgeCompileConfig](./primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeCompileConfig);  
knowledgeGetConfig?: [KnowledgeGetConfig](./primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeGetConfig);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

apiKey knowledgeCompileConfig knowledgeGetConfig?

## Properties

### apiKey

apiKey: string

Inworld API key for authentication

### knowledgeCompileConfig

knowledgeCompileConfig: [KnowledgeCompileConfig](./primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeCompileConfig)

Configuration for knowledge compilation

### `Optional`knowledgeGetConfig

knowledgeGetConfig?: [KnowledgeGetConfig](./primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeGetConfig)

Configuration for knowledge retrieval (optional)
